bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of legs without strength, in severe cases not moving according to one’s will. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 風緩湯..治脚弱，舉體痹不仁，熱毒氣入臟，胸中滿塞不通，食 即嘔吐方 , “The decoction for wind sluggishness : a recipe to cure weakness of one’s legs, blockage with numbness in the entire body, qi of heat poison entering the depots, fullness and blockage in the chest. If one eats, the food is thrown up again”.
